reviewText: DVD did not work on three different brands of Region 1 players. Package lists DVD as "Region 0." DVD does play on computer DVD drive. Original DVD was returned and replaced with new disc - same result. Because of limited playback options, give this one star.
I cannot play it at all on my tv; I don't know what system it is but it certainly is not one that I know of.  therefore, I certainly cannot rate it other than to say that it does not work.

I loved it, it was hilarious.  If you were thinking it's something dirty or about real life BDSM, nope.  it's exactly like those decade shows VH-1 always does around New Years with comedians, famous people and experts giving their opinions, sometime tongue in cheek and sometimes serious, and discussing the impact the book had on publishing culture and pop culture.  Jenny Eclair is hilarious -I think one comment she made regards to being women's interest in being dominated "I have lived with same man for 30 something years and I've never done anything he wanted me to do, not even by accident ."
